director.name: 大卫·普里查德 David Pritchard

trans_title: 里克·斯坦的蓝调寻味之旅
introduction: Ever since the early 1960s, Rick Stein has been in love with the blues and years later he is fascinated by the dishes ingrained in its lyrics - fried chicken and turnip greens, catfish and black-eyed peas, and the rest. In this film, Rick pays homage to the musicians who created this music and to the great dishes of the Mississippi Delta that go hand in hand with the blues.
chinese_title: 里克·斯坦的蓝调寻味之旅
